sense.name: leave out, exclude
sense.examples: She told me the most unfortunate vicissitudes of her life, not omitting a single detail. I have omitted some variables altogether from the original. The final version of the memorandum omitted the language regarding extreme pressure.

sense.name: neglect, fail to do
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent] OMIT [predicate] NP1[agent] OMIT NP2[patient]
sense.examples: The article omitted to mention victims of left wing revolutionary politics. They specifically omitted to protect the privacy of the commercial airline that assisted in this study. Don't omit to have your address either written or printed on the corner of every envelope. You omitted the duties of the package owner. Remember the need to take the medication as it is ordered, not omitting a single dose. (to take a single dose)
